verses.1: Mual Siangtho tungah ama phuh sa khuapi om hi.
verses.2: Topa in Israel gam mun dang khempeuhte sangin Zion kulh kongpi it zaw hi.
verses.3: Pasianʼ khuapi aw, na minthanna teng hong kigengen hi.
verses.4: Kei hong theite lakah Egypt le Babylon ka hel hi. Filistia, Taia le Ethiopia te zong kihel a, “Hihte pen hua lai mah panin a piang ahi hi,” kici ding hi.
verses.5: Zion tawh kisai-in ahihleh, “Minam khempeuh ama sung pan a suak ahi hi,” kici ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Sangpen pa mahmah in amah kipsak ding hi.
verses.6: Topa in, “Hihte pen hua lai-a suak,” ci-in minam khempeuh ciamtehin a gelh ding hi.
verses.7: Tua sunga teeng mite in, “Koteʼ lungdamna khempeuh nangma sungah om hi,” ci ciat ding uh hi.
